001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.paper;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core.Projectile;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.Ticks;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.bounds.Bound;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.Task;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
009import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.serializers.BasicBoundSerializer;
010import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
011import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.PaperUtils;
012import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.effect.PaperEffectors;
013import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.plugin.BasePlugin;
014import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.raycast.PaperRaycast;
015import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.paper.scheduler.PaperScheduler;
016import org.bukkit.*;
017import org.bukkit.block.Block;
018import org.bukkit.block.data.BlockData;
019import org.bukkit.block.data.Waterlogged;
020import org.bukkit.entity.Entity;
021import org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity;
022import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
023import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
024import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
025import org.bukkit.event.block.Action;
026import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent;
027import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
028import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.ObjectMapper;
029import org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.TypeSerializerCollection;
030
031import java.text.DecimalFormat;
032import java.text.DecimalFormatSymbols;
033import java.util.*;
034import java.util.function.Predicate;
035
036public final class CalibrePlugin extends BasePlugin<CalibrePlugin> {
037    private static final Map<Locale, DecimalFormat> DECIMAL_FORMATS = new HashMap<>();
038
039    private final PaperScheduler scheduler = new PaperScheduler(this);
040    private final PaperEffectors effectors = new PaperEffectors(this);
041    private final Map<Player, PlayerData> playerData = new HashMap<>();
042    private final Explosions explosions = new Explosions(this);
043    private final Penetration penetration = new Penetration(this);
044    private final Raycasts raycasts = new Raycasts(this);
045
046    public PaperScheduler scheduler() { return scheduler; }
047    public PaperEffectors effectors() { return effectors; }
048    public Explosions explosions() { return explosions; }
049    public Penetration penetration() { return penetration; }
050    public Raycasts raycasts() { return raycasts; }
051
052    public PlayerData playerData(Player player) {
053        return playerData.computeIfAbsent(player, k -> new PlayerData(this, k));
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void onEnable() {
058        super.onEnable();
059
060        scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> {
061            var iter = playerData.entrySet().iterator();
062            while (iter.hasNext()) {
063                var entry = iter.next();
064                if (entry.getKey().isValid()) {
065                    ctx.run(Task.single(entry.getValue()::tick));
066                } else
067                    iter.remove();
068            }
069        }, Ticks.MSPT));
070
071        Bukkit.getPluginManager().registerEvents(new Listener() {
072            /*
073                5.56x45mm Bullet:
074                  v = 900m/s
075                  m = 4g = 0.004kg
076                  diameter = 5.70mm = 0.0057m
077                  radius = 0.00285m
078                  cross section = πr^2 = 2.5517586328783095e-05
079                    = 0.000025517m^2
080                  ρ = 1.225kg/m^3
081
082                  Cd = 0.06 (https://sites.google.com/site/technicalarchery/technical-discussions-1/drag-coefficients-of-bullets-arrows-and-spears)
083
084                  F = ((1.225 x Cd x 2.552e-05) / 2) * 900^2
085                   -> 0.30386664
086
087                  a = F / m = 0.30386664 / 0.004
088                   -> 75.96666m/s^2
089                   -> 3.798m/t^2
090                 */
091
092            record PaperMedium(double density, @Nullable BlockData block, @Nullable Entity entity) implements Projectile.Medium<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> {
093                @Override
094                public String toString() {
095                    StringJoiner res = new StringJoiner(":");
096                    res.add(""+density);
097                    if (block != null)
098                        res.add(block.getMaterial().getKey().value());
099                    if (entity != null)
100                        res.add(entity.getName());
101                    return "[" + res.toString() + "]";
102                }
103
104                // so this is bad cause it only compares blocks by material
105                // TODO make it compare by more stuff for blocks
106                @Override
107                public boolean isOf(PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable hit) {
108                    if (block != null && hit.block() != null && block.getMaterial() == hit.block().getType()) return true;
109                    if (entity != null && hit.entity() != null && hit.entity().getEntityId() == entity.getEntityId()) return true;
110                    return false;
111                }
112
113                boolean hasWater() {
114                    if (block == null)
115                        return false;
116                    if (block.getMaterial() == Material.WATER)
117                        return true;
118                    if (block instanceof Waterlogged wl && wl.isWaterlogged())
119                        return true;
120                    return false;
121                }
122            }
123
124            PaperMedium mediumOf0(Block block) {
125                Material mat = block.getType();
126                return new PaperMedium(switch (mat) {
127                    case AIR -> 1.225;
128                    case WATER -> 997;
129                    case LAVA -> 2500;
130                    default -> mat.getBlastResistance() * 500;
131                }, block.getBlockData(), null);
132            }
133
134            @EventHandler
135            void onEvent(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
136                if (event.getAction() == Action.LEFT_CLICK_AIR) {
137                    Player player = event.getPlayer();
138                    World world = player.getWorld();
139                    Location eye = player.getEyeLocation();
140                    Vector3 pos = PaperUtils.toCommons(eye);
141                    Vector3 dir = PaperUtils.toCommons(eye.getDirection());
142
143                    PaperRaycast.Options options = new PaperRaycast.Options(
144                        new PaperRaycast.Options.OfBlock(false, false, null),
145                        new PaperRaycast.Options.OfEntity(null)
146                    );
147                    Projectile<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable, PaperMedium> projectile = new Projectile<>(
148                        raycasts.build(options, world), pos, dir.multiply(50), Projectile.GRAVITY,
149                        0.06, 2.55e-5, 0.004, mediumOf0(eye.getBlock())
150                    ) {
151                        @Override
152                        protected Predicate<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> castTest() {
153                            return b -> b.entity() == null || b.entity() != player;
154                        }
155
156                        @Override
157                        protected PaperMedium mediumOf(Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Raycast.Hit<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> hit) {
158                            var obj = hit.hit();
159                            if (obj.entity() != null) {
160                                return new PaperMedium(0, null, obj.entity());
161                            }
162                            if (obj.block() != null) {
163                                return mediumOf0(obj.block());
164                            }
165                            throw new IllegalStateException();
166                        }
167
168                        @Override
169                        protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
170                            if (!world.isChunkLoaded((int) position.x() / 16, (int) position.z() / 16)) {
171                                ctx.cancel();
172                                return 0;
173                            }
174                            double res = super.step(ctx, sec);
175                            player.spawnParticle(Particle.FLAME, PaperUtils.toPaper(position, world), 0);
176                            return res;
177                        }
178
179                        @Override
180                        protected void changeMedium(StepContext ctx, Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray, Vector3 position, PaperMedium oldMedium, PaperMedium newMedium) {
181                            super.changeMedium(ctx, ray, position, oldMedium, newMedium);
182                            Location location = PaperUtils.toPaper(position, world);
183                            world.spawnParticle(Particle.END_ROD, location, 0);
184
185                            if (
186                                newMedium.block != null
187                                && oldMedium.hasWater() != newMedium.hasWater()
188                                && !newMedium.block.getMaterial().isCollidable()
189                            ) {
190                                world.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_SPLASH, location, 16);
191                                world.spawnParticle(Particle.WATER_BUBBLE, location, 4, 0.05, 0, 0.05, 0);
192                                world.playSound(location, Sound.ENTITY_GENERIC_SPLASH, 1f, 1f);
193                            }
194
195                            /*if (ray.)
196
197                            double power = speed / originalSpeed;
198                            var bound = ray.hit().hi
199
200                            double penetration = 1 - hardness(bound) / (penetration() * power);
201                            if (penetration > 0) {
202                                // penetrates
203                                penetrate(direction, hit.out(), hit.penetration());
204                                velocity = velocity.multiply(Math.min(1, penetration));
205                                Coord3 coord = Coord3.coord3(speed, velocity.sphericalYaw(), velocity.sphericalPitch());
206                                // TODO deflection inside a medium stuff, make it variable
207                                velocity = coord
208                                        .yaw(coord.yaw() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * 0.05)
209                                        .pitch(coord.pitch() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * 0.05)
210                                        .cartesian();
211                                ++penetrated;
212                            } else {
213                                // try deflect
214                                Vector3 normal = hit.normal();
215                                double dot = Math.abs(direction.dot(normal));
216                                double deflectMult = 1 - dot / (deflectThreshold(bound) * power);
217                                if (deflectMult > 0) {
218                                    // deflect
219                                    deflect(direction, normal, deflectMult);
220                                } else {
221                                    // stuck
222                                    ctx.cancel();
223                                }
224                            }*/
225                        }
226                    };
227                    /*Projectile<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> projectile = new Bullet<>(
228                        raycastBuilder.build(world), pos, dir.multiply(100), Projectile.GRAVITY,
229                        0.06, 2.55e-5, 0.004
230                    ) {
231                        @Override
232                        protected double deflectThreshold(PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable hit) {
233                            return 0.2;
234                        }
235
236                        @Override
237                        protected double penetration() {
238                            return 5;
239                        }
240
241                        @Override
242                        protected double hardness(PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable hit) {
243                            return hit.block() == null ? 0 : penetration.hardness(hit.block().getBlockData());
244                        }
245
246                        @Override
247                        protected double mediumDensity(Vector3 pos) {
248                            // air = 1.225 kg/m^3
249                            // water = 997 kg/m^3
250                            // lava = 2500 kg/m^3
251                            Material mat = world.getBlockAt((int) pos.x(), (int) pos.y(), (int) pos.z()).getType();
252                            return switch (mat) {
253                                case WATER -> 150000;
254                                case LAVA -> 2500;
255                                default -> 1.225;
256                            };
257                        }
258
259                        @Override
260                        protected Predicate<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> test() {
261                            return b -> b.entity() == null || b.entity() != player;
262                        }
263
264                        @Override
265                        protected void step(TaskContext ctx, Vector3 origin, Vector3 direction, double speed, Raycast.Result<PaperRaycast.PaperBoundable> ray) {
266                            super.step(ctx, origin, direction, speed, ray);
267                            if (!world.isChunkLoaded((int) position.x() / 16, (int) position.z() / 16)) {
268                                ctx.cancel();
269                                return;
270                            }
271                            player.spawnParticle(Particle.END_ROD, PaperUtils.toPaper(position, world), 0);
272                        }
273                    };*/
274                    scheduler.run(Task.repeating(ctx -> ctx.run(Task.single(projectile::tick)), Ticks.MSPT));
275                } else {
276                    scheduler.cancel();
277                }
278            }
279        }, this);
280    }
281
282    public void damage(LivingEntity entity, double damage, @Nullable LivingEntity source) {
283        if (entity == source)
284            entity.damage(damage);
285        else
286            entity.damage(damage, source);
287    }
288
289    @Override
290    protected void configOptionsDefaults(TypeSerializerCollection.Builder serializers, ObjectMapper.Factory.Builder mapperFactory) {
291        super.configOptionsDefaults(serializers, mapperFactory);
292        serializers
293            .registerExact(Bound.class, BasicBoundSerializer.INSTANCE);
294    }
295
296    @Override
297    public void load() {
298        super.load();
299        explosions.load();
300        penetration.load();
301        raycasts.load();
302        for (var data : playerData.values()) {
303            data.load();
304        }
305    }
306
307    @Override
308    protected CalibreCommand createCommand() throws Exception {
309        return new CalibreCommand(this);
310    }
311
312    public static String format2(Locale locale, double value) {
313        DecimalFormat format = DECIMAL_FORMATS.computeIfAbsent(locale, k -> new DecimalFormat("0.##", DecimalFormatSymbols.getInstance(k)));
314        return format.format(value);
315    }
316
317    public static String format2Raw(Locale locale, double value) {
318        return String.format(locale, "%.2f", value);
319    }
320}
